overview: NXT Deadline is an upcoming professional wrestling pay-per-view and livestreaming event produced by WWE. It will be held exclusively for wrestlers from the promotion's NXT brand division. It will be the inaugural Deadline event, and will serve as the replacement for WarGames, which was originally NXT's December event before it moved to the main roster in 2022. It will take place on December 10, 2022.
title: NXT Deadline 2022
